title: Private entry and washer dryer hookup
posting_body: Take advantage of living within walking distance of most of your favorite restaurants, shopping venues, Oakland University, and entertainment.
Easy access to I-75 makes Roanoke Apartments convenient for all your needs!
Enjoy single floor living with all Studios, 1, and 2 Bedroom Apartment Homes.

Each spacious Apartment Home features private attic storage, private patios, door front parking, 24 hour emergency maintenance, quiet community living, and large utility room with full size washer and dryer connections in all 1 and 2 bedroom Apartment Homes.
Two bedroom, one bath coming available in the late August .
Rent is $1100 a month on a 12 month lease.
Residents pay a flat rate for water of $73 a month plus other utilities.
Apartment home features a large living room/dining room, walk through kitchen, laundry room with washer/dryer connections, an attic for extra storage, private patio and private entrance.
